test_samples.description: Tin tức về tấn công khủng bố (domain chính của training data)
test_samples.text: A suicide bomber detonated explosives near the government building, killing at least 15 people and injuring 30 others. The attack occurred during morning rush hour when the building was crowded with employees and visitors. Security forces immediately cordoned off the area and began investigating the incident.

test_samples.description: Bắt giữ tội phạm (domain phổ biến trong training)
test_samples.text: Police arrested three suspects in connection with the bank robbery that occurred last week. The suspects were apprehended during a raid on their hideout in the northern district. Authorities found stolen money and weapons at the location.

test_samples.description: Bạo lực và tấn công (domain chính)
test_samples.text: Protesters clashed with police during the demonstration, resulting in several injuries. The violence erupted when demonstrators tried to break through the barricades. Police used tear gas to disperse the crowd and arrested several individuals.

test_samples.description: Cái chết do tai nạn (domain phổ biến)
test_samples.text: A car accident on Highway 101 claimed the lives of four people and left two others seriously injured. The crash occurred when a truck lost control and collided with multiple vehicles. Emergency services rushed to the scene to provide medical assistance.

The court sentenced the convicted murderer to life in prison after a lengthy trial that lasted three months. The jury found the defendant guilty of first-degree murder based on DNA evidence and witness testimony. The victim's family expressed relief at the verdict.

World leaders met in Geneva to discuss climate change policies and international cooperation. The summit brought together representatives from 50 countries to address environmental challenges. Several agreements were reached during the three-day conference.

test_samples.description: Văn bản phức tạp với nhiều sự kiện (test khả năng phân biệt)
test_samples.text: The terrorist attack on the embassy killed 12 people and injured 25 others. Police arrested two suspects who were found hiding in a nearby building. The government condemned the attack and vowed to bring the perpetrators to justice. Emergency services provided medical assistance to the wounded.
test_samples.difficulty: Hard - Multiple events, needs good discrimination

test_samples.description: Sản xuất vũ khí (domain ít phổ biến)
test_samples.text: Authorities discovered a bomb-making facility in the abandoned warehouse. Police found explosives, timers, and other materials used to manufacture improvised explosive devices. The investigation revealed that the facility had been operating for several months.

test_samples.description: Vận chuyển bất hợp pháp (domain Movement)
test_samples.text: Border patrol agents intercepted a truck carrying illegal immigrants across the border. The vehicle was stopped at a checkpoint where officers discovered 25 people hidden in the cargo area. The driver was arrested and charged with human trafficking.

test_samples.description: Trường hợp mơ hồ, dễ nhầm lẫn
test_samples.text: The U.S. Department of State issued a statement regarding the recent developments in the region. Officials expressed concern about the escalating tensions and called for diplomatic solutions. The statement was broadcast on major news networks.

test_instructions.purpose: Test model performance on domains related to training data
evaluation_criteria: Handling multiple events in one text

api_test_commands.name: Test single easy sample
api_test_commands.command: curl -X POST 'http://localhost:8000/extract' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"text": "A suicide bomber detonated explosives near the government building, killing at least 15 people.", "top_k": 3}'
